fields.title: Biz Conditions
fields.content:
WHAT WE DO

We build websites and web applications using WordPress and Python/Django.

We offer Figma UI/UX design.

We support hosting setup, deployment, and site migrations.

We provide mobile responsive and browser-compatible builds.

We handle REST APIs, dashboards, and automation tools.

We offer monthly website maintenance and dev support plans.

First consultation is free. Further consultations are paid unless project starts.

WHAT WE DON’T DO

We do not work with Wix, Shopify, or Squarespace.

We do not build native mobile apps.

We do not provide content writing, SEO, or marketing unless discussed.

We do not build complex custom plugins/modules without a separate scope.

PRICING STRUCTURE

Full project build starting at 1000 USD for 10-15 days timeline.

2000 USD for 20-30 days timeline.

Projects requiring more than 30 days will receive a custom quote.

Minor issues like bug fixes, SEO errors, speed improvements or migrations are charged 50 USD per task.

Monthly maintenance plans available at 99 USD, 149 USD, and 299 USD with varying levels of support and dev hours.

PAYMENT & MILESTONE POLICY

All projects follow a prepaid milestone system.

Quotes are valid for 7 days only.

Payments must be made within 7 days of invoice, else project work will be paused.

New clients are eligible for a refund within 7 days if no meaningful work is done.

Projects include 2 free revisions per milestone. Extra revisions will be charged.

FEEDBACK POLICY

Clients must provide feedback within 3 days of submission.

Delayed feedback after 3 days will result in a timeline extension from day 4.

SCOPE CREEP POLICY

New tasks not part of the original scope must be submitted via the Feature Addition Form.

New quote and delivery timeline will be confirmed after internal review.

URGENT TASK / RESCHEDULING POLICY

If task priority or sequence is to be changed mid-project, a Reschedule Request Form must be filled.

This will not change the price but will extend the timeline due to reshuffling.

CONSULTATION POLICY

First consultation is free (30 minutes max).

Additional pre-project consultations are 49 USD per call.

Urgent meetings during the project outside scheduled feedback meetings are also charged at 49 USD per call.

COMMUNICATION POLICY

Phone support is not provided.

Support is provided via WhatsApp 24/7 and via email with priority.

Weekly feedback updates are provided.

Any meetings outside of scheduled feedback check-ins are paid.

CODE OWNERSHIP & CREDITS

Clients own the code after full payment.

Footer credits are optional.

Project may be used in our portfolio unless NDA is signed.

COMPANY INFO

Company name: Codesiddhi Technologies LLP

Brand name: codesiddhi

fields.title: FAQ
fields.content:
Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs)
1. What kind of projects do you take up?
We specialize in:

WordPress (including WooCommerce, ACF, SEO, speed)

Custom tools and dashboards using Python/Django

UI/UX design using Figma

Hosting, deployment, and site migrations

We do not work on Wix, Shopify, mobile apps, or content marketing projects.

2. What is your pricing model?
Full project builds start at $1,000 (10–15 days)

Larger builds start at $2,000 (20–30 days)

Projects beyond 30 days are quoted case-by-case

Minor tasks like bug fixes or SEO tweaks are $50 per incident

Monthly maintenance plans start at $99/month

3. Do I have to pay the full amount upfront?
No. We work on a milestone-based prepaid system. Each milestone is discussed and paid before that phase begins.

4. How do you handle revisions?
Each milestone includes 2 free revisions. Additional revisions may be billed separately depending on complexity.

5. What if I need to add a feature mid-project?
You’ll need to fill a Feature Addition Form. We will assess the task, provide a quote and update the delivery timeline accordingly.

6. What if I want to change the task priority or sequence?
You can submit a Reschedule Request Form. It may not increase the cost but will likely extend the timeline depending on availability.

7. Do you support phone calls?
We don’t provide phone support. We offer:

24/7 WhatsApp support

Email support (priority response)

Weekly scheduled feedback meetings

Additional urgent calls or consultations are available at $49 per call

8. Is my project mobile and browser compatible?
Yes. All builds are mobile-responsive and tested across major browsers.

9. What’s your refund policy?
For new clients:
If no meaningful work is completed within 7 days of payment, we offer a 100% refund. Once work begins, milestone payments are non-refundable.

10. What happens if I delay feedback?
You’re expected to respond within 3 days after submission of deliverables. From the 4th day onward, your delay will extend the deadline accordingly.

11. Do you offer consultations?
First pre-project consultation is free (up to 30 minutes)

Additional consultations before project confirmation are $49 per session

Urgent meetings during an ongoing project (outside regular check-ins) are also $49 per session

12. Who owns the code?
You own 100% of the code after full payment. We request footer credits if allowed and may use the project in our portfolio unless an NDA is signed.

13. How long are quotes valid?
All quotes are valid for 7 days. Post that, scope and pricing may change based on availability or updated requirements.

fields.title: Policy
fields.content:
Codesiddhi – Service & Project Policy Document
Services We Offer
Full WordPress development (WooCommerce, ACF, SEO/speed optimization)

Python/Django development (REST APIs, custom dashboards, automation tools)

UI/UX design using Figma

Hosting setup, site migrations, and deployment support

Consultation and project planning assistance

Services We Don’t Offer
Projects on platforms like Wix, Shopify, or Squarespace

Mobile or native app development

Deep custom plugin/module development (unless separately scoped)

Content writing or digital marketing (unless pre-agreed)

Pricing Policy
Full Project Builds:

$1,000 for 10–15 day project

$2,000 for 20–30 day project

Custom quote for projects beyond 30 days

Minor Gigs/Tasks (per incidence):

$50 for issues like bug fixes, SEO, speed optimization, or site migrations

Monthly Maintenance Plans:

$99 – Uptime monitoring and updates

$149 – Includes dev hours for minor tasks

$299 – Includes backups, security checks, 2hr/month dev time, and priority support
All plans are no-contract and can be cancelled anytime.

Timeline & Project Execution
Projects are executed in prepaid milestone phases

Weekly progress updates via WhatsApp or email

Two free revisions per milestone; extra revisions are chargeable

Client must share feedback within 3 days after submission; delays extend project deadline from day 4 onward

Scope Creep & Urgent Task Policy
Any additional features must be submitted via the “Feature Addition Form”

Urgent reshuffling of tasks during the project requires a “Reschedule Request Form”

No change in quote unless features are added, but timeline may be extended

Client Communication & Support
No phone call support

24/7 WhatsApp support and priority email communication

Weekly feedback meeting or reporting included

Additional consultation or urgent meetings (outside scheduled feedback) cost $49 per call

Consultation Policy
First pre-project consultation call is free (up to 30 mins)

Additional consultations before project confirmation are $49 per call

Code Ownership & Portfolio Usage
Client owns 100% of the code upon full payment

Footer credits are optional and can be removed if desired

We may include the project in our portfolio unless an NDA is in place

Quote, Payment & Refund Policies
Quotes are valid for 7 days from the issue date

Invoices must be paid within 7 days or all services and milestones will be paused

New client refund policy: 100% refundable within 7 days if no meaningful work has been done

Technical Delivery Guarantees
All projects are delivered fully mobile-responsive

All projects are tested for cross-browser compatibility

Company: Codesiddhi Technologies LLP
Brand: codesiddhi

fields.title: pricing rules
fields.content:
PRICING RULES - CODESIDDHI SERVICES

Full Project Builds (Design + Development + Deployment + 1-Month Bug Fix Warranty):

$1000 USD: Project timeline of 10–15 days

$2000 USD: Project timeline of 20–30 days

Projects requiring more than 30 days: Custom quote will be shared after evaluation

Minor Tasks / Gigs (One-Time Incidents):

$50 USD per incident

Includes tasks such as:

Bug fixing

Page speed issues

SEO errors

Website migrations

Monthly Maintenance Plans:

$99 USD/month

Uptime monitoring

Basic updates

$149 USD/month

Includes $99 plan features

Plus developer time for small tasks

$299 USD/month

Includes all features from $149 plan

2 hours of dev time per month

Security checks and backups

Priority WhatsApp and call support

Consultation Pricing:

First consultation (30 mins): Free

Additional consultation calls before project starts: $49 USD per call

Urgent meeting requests during active project (outside of feedback schedule): $49 USD per call

Important Notes:

Pricing is exclusive of taxes or payment gateway fees (if any).

All milestones are prepaid before starting the work.

If a project includes new tasks outside the scope, an additional quote and timeline will be provided.

Rescheduling task priority during a project may affect the timeline but not the quote.

All quotes are valid for 7 days.

Payment is due within 7 days of invoice.

If no meaningful work is done within 7 days of payment for new clients, full refund available.

fields.title: About company
fields.content:
SERVICES OFFERED
We provide the following services under Codesiddhi Technologies LLP:

Full Website Development

WordPress (ACF, WooCommerce, SEO, Speed Optimization)

Python/Django (custom dashboards, REST APIs, dynamic tools)

Fully responsive and cross-browser compatible

UX/UI Design

High-quality custom designs using Figma

Hosting & Deployment

End-to-end hosting support (we handle server setup, deployment, and launch)

No need for a separate DevOps unless preferred by the client

Site Migrations

Handled under our $50/incident gig pricing

Consultation Services

First call free (up to 30 minutes)

Paid consultations available at $49 USD per call (pre-project or urgent mid-project)

Maintenance Plans

Ongoing support including uptime monitoring, updates, backups, minor fixes, and priority support

Monthly plans: $99 / $149 / $299 USD

Custom Tools & Business Dashboards

Built using Django/Python and REST APIs

Tailored for business automation and internal processes

WHY CHOOSE US
500+ Websites Delivered

Experience across various industries, high-quality delivery

10+ Custom Web Applications Built

Designed for business use cases, automation, and performance

Top-Rated Developer on Upwork

Consistent 5-star feedback from global clients

20,000+ Students Trained via Udemy

Recognized educator in web technologies

8+ Years in the Industry

Strong knowledge of what works and what doesn’t in web development

End-to-End Delivery

We handle everything from UI/UX to development to deployment

Clients don’t need to hire separate design or DevOps teams

Strict Processes & Transparent Policies

Clear scopes, milestone-based progress, defined refund and support policies

Client-First Support Model

WhatsApp (24/7) and Email Support (priority)

Weekly updates and optional feedback meetings
